title: Wood-Style Flooring, Outdoor Lounge Area with Fire Pit
posting_body: ['Welcome to Copper Terrace', 'Copper Terrace offers sleek and stylish apartment homes for lease in the heart of the Denver Tech Center.', 'Enjoy easy access to modern amenities right outside your door, and the ideal location in Centennial, CO, our residents have everything they need nearby.', 'Our newly-renovated apartment homes, located in the desirable Cherry Creek School District, deliver a relaxing sanctuary each and every day while keeping you close to the DTC and minutes from downtown Denver.', 'Schedule your personal tour of Copper Terrace apartments today.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 30', 'OR Text', '30', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 729 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Fully-Equipped Kitchens', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Plush Carpeting', '- One-, Two-, and Three- Bedroom Residences', '- Gas Fireplaces*', '- Open-Concept Living Areas', '- Wood-Style Flooring', '- Ceiling Fans in Living Areas*', '- Private Fenced Yard *', '- Personal Patios/Balconies', '- Valet Waste- Doorstep Trash Pickup', '- Oversized Walk-In Closets', '* Only available in select apartments', 'Community Amenities', '- Resident Lounge', '- Private Dog Park', '- Easy access to Light Rail and I-25 Freeway', '- Outdoor Grills', '- Professional On-Site Management', '- Complete Fitness Center, Open 24/7', '- Additional Storage*', '- Online Payments Available', '- Located in the Highly-Rated Cherry Creek School District', '- Resort-Inspired Pool', '- Outdoor Lounge Area with Fire Pit', '- Modern Clubhouse with Wi-Fi Access in Common Areas', '- Smoke Free Community', '- Conveniently Located Near Denver Tech Center', '- Near Cherry Creek Reservoir', '- Newly-Renovated Community', '- Dog Wash', '- Detached Garages Available', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'We allow 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet Fee $200.00 non-refundable (per pet), Pet Deposit: $200.00 refundable (per pet), & Pet Rent $35.00 per month/per pet.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Copper Terrace', '6550 S Dayton St., Centennial, CO, 80111', 'Qhn1bJa1Lb']
